text:
$T_{n+4}=\frac{1}{n} \left(1+4\right)$

Simplify the expression.

$T_{n+4}=\frac{1}{n} \left(5\right)$

Evaluate the expression.

$T_{n+4}=5 \frac{1}{n}$

Simplify the fraction.

$T_{n+4}=5 n^{-1}$ So the answer is $T_{n+4}=5 n^{-1}$
